Description: *** SHIPPING & INSURANCE (COSTS $160-200 USD ) IS INCLUDED IN THE BUY IT NOW PRICE FOR EASY CALCULATION *** Here is a clean and rare 2006 Gibson USA Billie Joe Armstrong Green Day Les Paul Junior guitar for sale! Mahogany neck and body w/ rosewood fretboard, vintage sunburst finish w/ single ply black pick guard, BJA signature on the back of the headstock, single P-90 pu w/ vol & tone controls, nickel vintage style Kluson pegs & wrap around bar bridge, guitar weighs 3.4 kilos on my digital scale, I do not have the OHSC but brown Gibson HSC pictured is included! *** This guitar is in clean condition w/ some scratches, few tiny dimples & dings, some fret wear, minor wear on the hardware due to age, Overall condition 8.7/10!!! *** I am NOT a vintage specialist, luthier or a guitar shop *** Please look at all the pics carefully for exact condition, details & originality *** I do not have any other info or history of this guitar, so please don't ask *** Google for exact spec & additional info!*** I HAVE DESCRIBED THE DETAILS OF THIS VINTAGE USED GUITAR TO THE BEST OF MY KNOWLEDGE *** PLEASE ASK ALL QUESTIONS, LOOK AT ALL THE PICS, JUDGE and DECIDE FOR YOURSELF BEFORE PURCHASE *** SALE IS FINAL / NO CLAIMS or RETURNS / SOLD AS IS *** IMMEDIATE PAYMENT BY PAYPAL ONLY *** ALL RUDE MESSAGES WILL BE REPORTED TO EBAY IMMEDIATELY AND WILL AUTOMATICALLY BE ON MY BID BLOCK LIST PERMANENTLY *** *** I will ONLY ship to your VERIFIED/CONFIRMED paypal address *** I will pack this guitar very well in a heavy duty guitar box, and ship by EMS(express mail service) fully insured through Japan post to your Postal carrier *** Delivery time varies depending on your location and how fast the customs in your country will clear the item (usually 4-7 days to USA) *** *** USA buyers will NOT be taxed since this guitar is made in USA ****** ALL TAXES, CUSTOMS FEES, or IMPORT DUTIES ARE BUYERS RESPONSIBILITY *** THESE CHARGES WILL BE COLLECTED BY CUSTOMS IN YOUR COUNTRY BEFORE OR ON DELIVERY *** PLEASE CHECK WITH YOUR LOCAL TAX LAWS & REGULATIONS REGARDING THIS MATTER *** Declared value will be the insured value *** *** I will not be responsible for any damages occurred during transit as I do not have any control over the handling of the package *** If for some reason a claim does arise, I will assist you 100% with insurance claim! *** I will ship within 24-48 Hours after receiving payment in full *** I will send all EMS tracking information right after the item has been shipped *** Thanks for looking!!!
Title: 2006 GIBSON LES PAUL JUNIOR BILLIE JOE ARMSTRONG GREEN DAY CLEAN  & RARE!!!
